behaviour_trees.​ base.​ XPS_BT_typ_Condition

TypeDefinition

Authors

CrashDome

Description

A node for a Behaviour Tree that has an ProcessTick method which is called when Ticked

Parent

virtual. XPS_BT_typ_Leaf

Implements

XPS_BT_ifc_INode

Flags

none

Protected
preTick

virtual. XPS_BT_typ_Leaf. preTick

processTick
_status = _self call ["processTick"]
Description

The code that executes during a Tick cycle of a Behaviour Tree and then returns a status.

Parameters
_status

String - "RUNNING", "SUCCESS", "FAILURE", or nil

Returns
_status

String - "RUNNING", "SUCCESS", "FAILURE", or nil

postTick

virtual. XPS_BT_typ_Leaf. postTick

Methods
Condition
Condition = _self call ["Condition"]
Description

The code that executes during a Tick cycle of a Behaviour Tree and then returns true/false.

Must be Overridden.

Returns
Condition

Boolean - True or False

Init

virtual. XPS_BT_typ_Leaf. Tick

Tick

virtual. XPS_BT_typ_Leaf. Tick
